meanings.definition: A television information retrieval service using text-based pages.
meanings.sent1: I read the news on teletext every morning.
meanings.sent2: The teletext on my TV provides weather updates.
meanings.sent3: The teletext made me chuckle with its quirky font choices.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a teletext, displaying information clearly and quickly.
meanings.sent5: The teletext displayed breaking news in bold letters.

meanings.definition: To broadcast or receive information through teletext.
meanings.sent1: They teletexted the latest sports scores to viewers.
meanings.sent2: I will teletext the announcement to all employees.
meanings.sent3: He tried to teletext a secret message to his friend across the room.
meanings.sent4: The information teletexted to me was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: She quickly teletexted the urgent update to the team.
